Class CommunityFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.detection.diseases.maize.usecases.community.CommunityFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, CommunityContract.View

    public class CommunityFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements CommunityContract.View
    Author:
    Augustine A Fragment responsible for all community section interaction on issues Responsible for displaying issues, liking issue, marking an issue as resolved, etc
